ExtendedByPolicy.meaning: The edge indicates that a certificate template includes an issuance policy as a certificate extension. An attacker may perform the ADCS ESC13 abuse which relies on an issuance policy included in a certificate. This relationship alone is not enough to escalate rights or impersonate other principals.
ExtendedByPolicy.common: 不可直接利用 - 此关系本身不足以提升权限或冒充其他主体，需要结合 ADCS ESC13 攻击技术来利用证书模板中的颁发策略扩展
